scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Family on a journey, with Saint Joseph leading a donkey on which the Virgin Mary is seated, holding the Christ Child. Saint Joseph, dressed in red and blue, wears a red cap and carries a staff. The Virgin Mary, in a blue robe and mantle, cradles the infant Jesus. They are depicted in an outdoor setting with lush green grass, trees, and a rocky outcrop. The background features a decorative, tessellated pattern. This imagery represents the Flight into Egypt, a significant event in the early life of Jesus.
